scripts.build: nexe index.js 'TTVDropBot' --ico twitch.ico --rc { CompanyName: "Zarg", PRODUCTVERSION: "1,3,3,3", FILEVERSION: "1,3,3,3"} --build
scripts.buildwithmodules: nexe index.js 'TTVDropBot' -r node_modules/ --ico twitch.ico --rc { CompanyName: "Zarg", PRODUCTVERSION: "1,3,3,3", FILEVERSION: "1,3,3,3"} --build
scripts.buildforlinux: nexe index.js 'TTVDropBot' -r node_modules/ --ico twitch.ico --rc { CompanyName: "Zarg", PRODUCTVERSION: "1,3,3,3", FILEVERSION: "1,3,3,3"} --target linux-x64 --build
